transbit.tbits.report
Class TBitsReportEngine

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.report.TBitsReportEngine

public class TBitsReportEngine
extends java.lang.Object

This is a Singleton class which wraps the BirtReportEngine and provide developer-friendly methods to create the reports. This introduces new generateXXX methods for easy generation of PDF / HTML file and output-stream

getReportParameters

public java.lang.String getReportParameters(java.lang.String reportFileName)

generateReportFile

public void generateReportFile(java.lang.String reportFileName,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> reportVariables,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> reportParams,
                               org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.IRenderOption renderOptions)
                        throws TBitsException
Generates any file supported by birt and given in the renderOptions

Parameters:
reportFileName - : name of the rptdesign file used. It must be present in the tbitsreports folder of tBits.
reportVariables - : these variable are passed to the task's app-context. Should contain any Java Object or JavaScript variables used in the report rptdesign
renderOptions - : these are the Birt based IRenderOption where you can set the output file/ stream and type of file and any other handler required.
reportParams - : these are ReportParameters used in the report which are usually used in any db-query of the report
Throws:
TBitsException - : all the exception's will be wrapped in TBitsException.

generateReportFile

public java.io.OutputStream generateReportFile(java.lang.String reportFileName,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> reportVariables,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> reportParams,
                                               java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                                               java.lang.String fileType)
                                        throws TBitsException
Generates either PDF or HTML and directs the output to the given non-null OutputStream for the given report.

Parameters:
reportFileName - : name of the rptdesign file used. It must be present in the tbitsreports folder of tBits.
reportVariables - : these variable are passed to the task's app-context. Should contain any Java Object or JavaScript variables used in the report rptdesign
reportParams - : these are ReportParameters used in the report which are usually used in any db-query of the report
outputStream - : the specific OutputStream to which the data has to be written. If null then an error is thrown.
fileType - : one of the two constants defined FILE_TYPE_PDF / FILE_TYPE_HTML for the respective file
Returns:
: returns the OutputStream object which streams the report
Throws:
TBitsException - : all the exception's will be wrapped in TBitsException.

generateReportFile

public java.io.File generateReportFile(java.lang.String reportFileName,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> reportVariables,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> reportParams,
                                       java.io.File outputFile,
                                       java.lang.String fileType)
                                throws TBitsException
Generates either PDF of HTML File for the given report.

Parameters:
reportFileName - : name of the rptdesign file used. It must be present in the tbitsreports folder of tBits.
reportVariables - : these variable are passed to the task's app-context. Should contain any Java Object or JavaScript variables used in the report rptdesign
reportParams - : these are ReportParameters used in the report which are usually used in any db-query of the report
outputFile - : the specific file to which the data has to be written. If null then a temporary file will be created. If not null and the file does not exists then it will be created.
fileType - : one of the two constants defined FILE_TYPE_PDF / FILE_TYPE_HTML for the respective file
Returns:
: returns the file Object which contains the report
Throws:
TBitsException - : all the exception's will be wrapped in TBitsException.

                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> reportVariables,

                                    java.io.File outputFile)

reportParams - : these are ReportParameters used in the report which are usually used in any db-query of the report
outputFile - : the specific file to which the data has to be written. If null then a temporary file will be created. If not null and the file does not exists then it will be created.
Returns:
: returns the file Object which contains the report

TBitsException - : all the exception's will be wrapped in TBitsException.
